title: "LEL"
body:
Laughing Enormously Loud?
Laughing Elegantly Loud?
Laughing Enviously Loud?
Laughing Especially Loud?
Laughing Extra Loud?
Laughing Extraordinarily Loud?
Laughing Extravagantly Loud?
Laughing Enticingly Loud?

LEL

replies.body:
it's just lol
but with an e instead of an o
and kek is just lel with but with k instead of l
actually kek is a reference to how characters are portrayed laughing in comics and manga, kekekekekeke

> [{quoted}](name=GoldenTomat0,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=l7bxkXnQ,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-05-07T02:24:25.441+0000)
>
> it's just lol
> but with an e instead of an o
> and kek is just lel with but with k instead of l

basically

i will start new trend
lul

"Laughing erotically loud".

Ladies and gents, I have won.

lel originated from 4chan as a different way of writing "lol", alongside "kek". Often, the two are combined with the word "top", in order to convey just how hilarious something is, i.e. "look at this dipshit, top kek" or "and then he an hero'd, top lel".

It's basically a way of saying lol, but sort of with a bit more meaning behind it.

> [{quoted}](name=jb3navides,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=l7bxkXnQ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-06T09:20:44.081+0000)
>
> thought it was just a troll way of saying lol

lmao it is I'm just trying to put an acronym to it xD

> [{quoted}](name=jb3navides,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=l7bxkXnQ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-06T09:20:44.081+0000)
>
> wait lel has is actually an acronym? thought it was just a troll way of saying lol. But i guess i am kinda right because pretty much the same meaning.

I think that's the origin of lel too.
